hero.name: Ranielli Montagna

passion.part2: who turns business ideas into fast, scalable, and easy-to-use digital products

hero.description: I build web and mobile applications end-to-end, combining solid architecture, user experience, and performance from the first commit.
hero.seoDescription: From discovery to production delivery, I prioritize clean code, accessibility, technical SEO, and Core Web Vitals to generate measurable and sustainable results.

bio.name: Ranielli Montagna
bio.intro: a full stack developer passionate about turning ideas into innovative digital solutions. With over 3 years of experience, I specialize in creating web and mobile applications that combine exceptional functionality with intuitive design.
bio.journey: My journey began with a curiosity about how things work on the web, and since then I have been developing projects that positively impact people's lives. I believe technology should be accessible and make a difference.
bio.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or planning my next development adventure.

experience.subtitle: Over 3 years building innovative solutions in companies of different sizes and segments, always focused on delivering value and growing technically.

luizalabs.description: I am part of the Luizalabs team, the technology innovation unit of Magalu, one of Brazil's largest retailers. I develop and maintain web and mobile applications for physical store operations, as well as robust and scalable APIs and backend solutions.
highlights: Development of applications for retail operations
Maintenance of APIs and backend solutions
System integration in a high-impact environment
Work with modern and scalable technologies

smarten.description: I led a team of developers, ensuring code quality and application optimization. I created and maintained the corporate design system, and implemented monitoring and CI/CD solutions, boosting the efficiency and stability of the products.
highlights: Technical leadership of a developer team
Creation and maintenance of a design system

sbsistemas.description: First professional experience in the technology field, where I consolidated my technical foundation in front-end development. I developed applications using modern technologies and implemented best development practices.
highlights: Consolidation of a solid technical foundation

projects.subtitle: A selection of my most recent work, including web, mobile applications, and APIs that demonstrate my technical skills.

cta.text: Want to see more projects? Explore my GitHub repository with over 100 open source projects!

northClinic.title: North Clinic - Management System
northClinic.description: Complete management system for clinics and offices, with online scheduling, electronic health records, financial control, and billing.

mobileEstoquista.title: Magalu Stockist Mobile
mobileEstoquista.description: Corporate superapp for stockists at Magalu's physical stores, optimizing inventory control, goods receipt, and dispatch.

pratio.title: Pratio - POS for Restaurants
pratio.description: Point of sale (POS) and management system for bars and restaurants, with table and order control, NFC-e issuing, and a digital menu.

contact.subtitle: I'm interested in freelance or full-time opportunities. If you have a project in mind or just want to chat, I'd be happy to talk.

content.title: How I build web projects
content.paragraph1: On this page, you can explore real projects I built with a focus on user experience, performance, and code quality. Each project starts from a concrete problem and is structured to remain scalable and maintainable.
content.paragraph2: Beyond implementation, I also prioritize architecture, observability, and documentation. The goal is to deliver digital products that run well in production and can evolve safely over time.
points: Modular architecture with reusable components and strong typing.
Performance and Core Web Vitals integrated into the development workflow.
Testing, linting, and CI standards to keep quality consistent.
